Samples of Formulae - \u8655\u65b9\u8209: For edema of limbs and escites: Name of formula: qian niu san (pu ji fang) Composition: qian niu zi, mu tong, bai zhu, sang gen bai pi, mu xiang, rou gui, chen pi. For worm parasites: Name of formula: qian niu san (Sheng's zhun sheng) Composition: qian niu zi, da huan, bing nang, xiong huang. 牽牛散《普濟方》：牽牛子，木通，白朮，桑根白皮，木香，肉桂，陳皮。治水氣肢體浮腫，大小便澀， 上氣喘促。 牽牛散《沈氏尊生》：牽牛子，大黃，檳榔，雄黃。治蟲積。
Contraindications / Toxicity - \u6bd2\u7: This is a strong herb. Using small amount can help bowel movements. Using large amount can cause heavy diarrhea. It can be used temporary for cough with abundance of phlegm and asthma but do not use for long time or in large amount. Do not use in cases pixu (spleen deficient), qixu (qi deficient) or during pregnancies.The raw seed is toxic and it smell is pungent and strong, and its laxative effect if drastic. After stir frying, it toxicity is less and the laxative effect is mild. After stir frying, the herb is loose and brittle and easier to smash and easier to decoct to extract the effective ingredients. 牽牛子為峻下的藥品，少用 則通大便，多用則瀉下如水。於用治痰壅氣滯，咳 逆喘滿，則只宜暫用，不可久服。孕婦及 脾虛 或 氣虛 者忌服。 生牽牛子有毒，氣味峻烈而瀉下力猛。炒牽牛子之毒性較小，瀉下作用較緩 和。且炒過後藥材質地變鬆脆，而易於粉碎和煎出有效成分

Name: chuan niu xi 川牛膝
Latin Name - \u62c9\u4e01\u540d: Cyathula officinalis Kuan
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: mainly being produced in Sichuan, Yunnan, and Guizhou. Recently also propagated in Shaanxi, Hubei, and Hunan. 主產於四川、雲南、貴州。近年來陝西、湖北、湖 南有栽培。
Properties / Characteristics - \u6027\u5: sweet, slightly bitter, neutral. 甘，微苦，平。

Medical Function - \u85e5\u7406: 蛻皮甾酮對天芥菜鹼(heliotrine)所 致肝炎大鼠，有加速肝功能恢復正常的作用[9]。

Actions & Indications - \u4e3b\u6cbb: rheumatism, hematuria, amenorrhea, abdominal mass （fibroids of the uterus, ovarian cysts, endometriosis, pelvic inflammation, blood retention due to gynatresia, extra-uterine pregnancy, bleeding in the uterus, and other pelvic masses) 濕腰膝疼痛，腳痿筋攣，血淋，尿血，婦女經閉，症瘕（子宮肌瘤，卵巢囊腫，子宮內膜異位症, 盆腔炎性包 塊, 陰道閉鎖的月經瀦留, 陳舊性宮外孕, 內生殖器的畸胎瘤, 或某些婦科癌變等所表現的盆腔腫塊, 脹痛, 或出血。 ）
Daily Dosage - \u6bcf\u65e5\u7528\u91cf: for decoction: 6 to 10 g, or use in pills or in powder form. It can be used for soaking in alcohol for drinking. 煎湯: 6～10g；或入丸，散，亦可 泡酒飲。
Samples of Formulae - \u8655\u65b9\u8209: 1. Name of formula: xie qing tang with adjustment Application: hypertension with headache, constipation, stringy, stiff and large on the 3 positions of the pulse. Composition: fang feng, long dan cao, shan zhi zi, da huang, huang qin, chuan niu xi. 加減瀉青丸 (小兒藥證直訣) 主治：功能主治 高血壓頭痛，氣實便結，脈三部弦硬而大者。 處方 防風、龍膽草、山梔子、大黃 、黃芩、川牛膝。 用法用量 水煎服。 摘錄 《雜病証治新義》
Contraindications / Toxicity - \u6bd2\u7: not to use in case of pregnancy, excess bleeding during menstruation and spermatorrhea 懷孕，經期出血過多，遺精者忌用。

Name: ju hong 橘紅
Latin Name - \u62c9\u4e01\u540d: Citrus maxima (Burm.) Merr. cv. TomentosaCitrus grandis (L.) OsbeckCitrus grandis var. Tomentosa Hort.
Other Name - \u5225\u540d: you pi ju hong 柚皮橘紅，Hua ju hong 化橘紅，Hua Zhou ju hong 化州橘紅，you zi pi 柚子皮。
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: The herb is produced in Hua Zhou, Mao Ming districts of Guangdong province and Bo Bai, Lu Chuan districts of Guangxi, Qian Yang district of Hunan or China.產廣東（化州，茂名），廣西（博白，陸川等），湖南（黔陽）。
Actions & Indications - \u4e3b\u6cbb: Being used in wind cold type of cold and cough, itchy throat with abundance of phlegm, indigestion and over eating, over consumption of alcohol, chronic stomachache, flatulence, burping bad smell and tightness in stomach功能下氣消痰兼除寒發表。用於風寒咳嗽, 喉痒痰多, 食積傷酒, 哎惡痞悶，慢性氣管炎，哮喘，飲食積滯，食積傷酒，嘔惡痞悶， 長期胃痛，氣痛等。
Chemical Ingredients - \u5316\u5b78\u621: fruit contains naringin, naringenin. Peel contians citral, geraniol, linalool, anthranilic acid), methyl ester.果實含柚皮甙（naringin）、柚皮甙元（naringenin） ；果皮含枸櫞醛（citral）、香葉醇（geraniol）、芳樟醇（linalool）、磷氨基苯甲酸 (anthranilic acid),甲 酯 (methyl ester ）等
Samples of Formulae - \u8655\u65b9\u8209: sheng tie luo yin 生鐵落飲,
Contraindications / Toxicity - \u6bd2\u7: Do not use in cases hot phlegm with qixu (qi deficient) and/or yinxu (yin deficient) condition.氣虛及 陰虛有燥痰者不宜服。

Name: tie xian cai 鐵莧菜
Latin Name - \u62c9\u4e01\u540d: Acalypha australis Linn.
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: Distributed in the south of the Yangtze River, middle and lower end of Yellow River, coastal and southwest and south China provinces other regions in China; additionally, in North Korea, Vietnam, Japan, the Philippines, New York state of the United States, .在中國分佈於長江以南，黃河中下游，沿海及西南、華南各省區；此外，朝鮮、越南、日本、菲律賓, 美國的紐約州也有。
Meridians Entered - \u6b78\u7d93: heart, lung, large intestine, small intestine.心，肺，大腸，小腸。
Medical Function - \u85e5\u7406: Medical function: In vitro tie xian cai decoction possesses antibiotic effect on several common Shigella antibacterial, especially on Shigella dysentery bacillus (2-fold dilution method in vitro). The dilution of 1:256, not only possesses bacteria inhibition effect also possesses bactericidal effect. Antibiotic effect on Shushi and Freund Shigella is less, and the antibiotic effect of Shigella sonnei bacilli is least. In vitro the tablets made ​​of tie xian cai also possesses anti Shigella effect. In vitro, 50% tie xian cai decoction possesses various degrees of inhibitory effect on Staphylococcus aureus, Vibrio cholerae, Bacillus anthracis, Shushi Shigella (using agar plate method). The antibacterial effect seems to be different on different parts of the roots, stems, and leaves, and on different bacteria. Tie xian cai alcohol extract also possesses antibacterial effect. 藥理﹕鐵莧水煎液在體外對幾種常見的痢疾杆菌都有抗菌作用，尤其對志賀氏痢疾杆菌效果好（試管內2倍稀釋法），在稀釋度為1:256時，不但有抑菌效力，且有殺菌作用。對舒氏和弗氏痢疾杆菌作用次之，對宋內氏痢疾杆菌效果最差。以鐵莧制成的片劑，在體外亦有同樣抗痢疾杆菌之效。50％鐵莧煎劑在體外對金黃色葡萄球菌、霍亂弧菌、炭疽杆菌、舒氏痢疾杆菌有不同程度抑菌作用（瓊脂平板法）；其根，莖、葉中皆含抗菌成分，但對不同細菌，用植物的不同部分其抗菌效力似有差異；鐵莧醇提物亦有同樣抗菌作用。
Actions & Indications - \u4e3b\u6cbb: Detoxifies, improves nutrition, stops dysentery, arrests bleeding. For treatment of enteritis, dysentery, amoebic dysentery, malnutrition in children, hepatitis, malaria, vomiting blood, epistaxis, hematuria, blood in the stool, uterine bleeding; topical treatment of carbuncle sores, traumatic bleeding, eczema, dermatitis, snake bites.清熱解毒，消積，止痢，止血。用於腸炎，細菌性痢疾，阿米巴痢疾，小兒疳積，肝炎，瘧疾，吐血，衄血，尿血，便血，子宮出血；外用治癰癤瘡瘍，外傷出血，濕疹，皮炎，毒蛇咬傷。
Daily Dosage - \u6bcf\u65e5\u7528\u91cf: 15 to 30 g.External use: appropriate amount. Use fresh herb. Smash and apply to affected area.0.5～1兩。外用適量，鮮品搗爛敷患處。
Samples of Formulae - \u8655\u65b9\u8209: Treatment of enteritis, diarrhea, vomiting blood, nose bleeding, blood in the stool, cough, asthma: dried tie xian cai 30 to 60 g. Make into decoction and take orally. (Guangzhou armed forces "Chinese Herbal Medicine Handbook")Treatment of dermatitis, eczema: wash the Jianshui outside oftie xian cai. (Guangzhou armed forces "Chinese Herbal Medicine Handbook")Treatment of traumatic bleeding: fresh tie xian cai , appropriate amount, and a little sugar. Smash and apply topically.Treatment of snake bites: tie xian cai, ban bian lian, da qing ye, 30 g each. Make into decoction and take orally. (Jiangxi Herbs)Treating traumatic wounds: tie xian cai 18 to 30 g. Make into decoction and take orally. ("Shanghai Chinese Herbal Medicine)Treatment of Infantile Malnutrition: fresh tie xian cai 30 to 60 g. Make soup with pig liver. Take orally. ("Zhejiang Folk Commonly Used Herbs")Treatment of Infantile bloating, testicular enlargement: fresh tie xian cai 30 to 60 g products. Make into decoction. Take orally. ("Zhejiang Folk Commonly Used Herbs")Treatment of uterine bleeding: fresh tie xian cai 30 to 60 g. Smash and make juice or make into decoction. Take orally. (Northeast Chinese Herbal Medicine Handbook)Treatment of Lack of mother's milk: fresh tie xian cai15 to 30 g. or use dried herb 6 g to 9 g. make into decoction with fish. Take orally. (Northeast Chinese Herbal Medicine Handbook)Treatment of scarlet fever, eczema: fresh tie xian cai, smash and make juice. Apply to affected area. ("Guizhou medicine")Treatment of asthma or coughing up blood: fresh tie xian cai 30 g. Make into decoction and take orally. ("Guizhou medicine")Treatment of necrosis fistula: dried tie xian cai dry 60 to 90 g, dried gou er cha (rhizome berchemia) 60 g. Simmer with wine and water. Take orally. (Fujian Chinese Herbal Medicine) 治腸炎，痢疾，吐血，衄血，便血，咳嗽氣喘：鐵莧乾品一至二兩。水煎服。（廣州部隊《常用中草藥手冊》） 治皮炎，濕疹：鐵莧煎水外洗。（廣州部隊《常用中草藥手冊》） 治外傷出血：鮮鐵莧菜適量，白糖少許。搗爛外敷。 治蛇咬傷：鐵莧菜、半邊蓮、大青葉各一兩。水煎服。《江西草藥》 治跌打創傷：血見愁(鐵莧菜) 六錢至-兩。水煎服。《上海常用中草藥》 治小兒疳積：鮮鐵莧菜一至二兩，和豬肝煎汁服。《浙江民間常用草藥》 治小兒腹脹，睪丸腫大：鐵莧菜鮮品一至二兩。水煎服。《浙江民間常用草藥》 治子宮出血：鐵莧菜鮮品一至二兩。搗汁服或水煎服。《東北常用中草藥手冊》 治乳汁不足：鐵莧菜鮮晶五錢至一兩，或乾品二至三錢。煎水，煮魚服。《東北常用中草藥手冊》 治丹疹，濕疹：燈盞窩(鐵莧菜)搗絨，取汁外擦。《貴州草藥》 治哮喘或咳血：燈盞窩(鐵莧菜)二兩。煎水服。《貴州草藥》 治附骨疽瘘管：鐵莧菜乾品二至三兩，勾兒茶乾根莖二兩。酒、水煎服。《福建中草藥》
Contraindications / Toxicity - \u6bd2\u7: Do not use during pregnancy. Those who are old or weak with qi deficient should use less."孕婦忌用，老弱 氣虛者少用。" 《泉州本草》

Name: ji nei jin 雞內金
Latin Name - \u62c9\u4e01\u540d: Gallus gallus domesticus Brisson
Other Name - \u5225\u540d: ji zhun pi, nei jin, jiu ji jin, hua shi dan, ji zhen pi, ji jin. 雞肫皮，內金 、炙雞金，化石膽，雞胗皮，雞筋。
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: throughout China 全國都有。
Meridians Entered - \u6b78\u7d93: spleen, stomach, small intestine, bladder. 脾﹐胃﹐小腸 ﹐膀胱。
Medical Function - \u85e5\u7406: increases digestive juices thus shortens the emptying time of the bowels 增加消化液﹐ 縮短排便時間。
Actions & Indications - \u4e3b\u6cbb: Being used in weak digestion, vomiting, diarrhea, children worm parasites , bed wetting, spermatorrhea. amenorrhea. 用于食積不消 ，嘔吐瀉痢，小儿疳積，尿路結 石 ﹐肝胆結石﹐遺尿﹐遺精﹐閉經[1]。
Chemical Ingredients - \u5316\u5b78\u621: ventriculin, keratin, bilatriene, vitamin B1, B2 胃激素, 角 蛋白, 膽汁三烯, 維生素B1﹐維生素B2。
Daily Dosage - \u6bcf\u65e5\u7528\u91cf: For decoction: 3 to 10 g. In Powder Form: 1.5 to 3 g. The effect is deemed to be better than that of decoction. 煎劑﹕ 3－10 g。 研末服﹕每次1.5－3g，效果可能比入煎 劑 好。
Samples of Formulae - \u8655\u65b9\u8209: stones in the urinary tract:jin qian cao,, ji nei jin bed wetting of children and adult frequent urination : sang piao xiao, long gu, mo li 尿石﹕金 錢草﹐雞 內金 小兒尿失禁﹐ 成人尿頻﹕桑螵蛸﹐ 龍骨﹐牡 蠣 。

Name: jiu cai 韭菜
Latin Name - \u62c9\u4e01\u540d: Allium tuberosum Rottler
Japanese Name - \u65e5\u8a9e: nira (kanji: 韮; hiragana: にら; katakana: ニラ)， kyushi (seed)
Other Name - \u5225\u540d: jiu 韭，shan jiu 山韭，feng ben 豐本，bian cai 扁 菜，cao zhong ru 草鐘乳，qi yang cao 起陽草，chang sheng jiu 長生韭，lan ren cai 懶 人菜。
Common Name - \u82f1\u6587\u540d: English: Chinese leeksTagalog, Cebuan: kutsayNepalese: dundoku sagIndonesian: bawang kucai
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: whole China.全中國。
Properties / Characteristics - \u6027\u5: Seed: acrid, sweet, warm葉：甘 ，辛，鹹，溫。根：辛。韭子：辛，甘，溫。
Meridians Entered - \u6b78\u7d93: Seed: kidney, liver.Leaves: stomach, liver, kidney.Roots: liver.韭菜籽：腎，肝。葉：胃，肝，腎。根：肝。
Medical Function - \u85e5\u7406: The sulfur compound in jiu cai can help absorb vitamin A and B1.Effect on cardiovascular system: its sulfur containing substance and ascorbic acid can improve the activities of endotthelial nitric oxide synthase (eNOs) thus promoting vasodilation and lowering blood pressure, improving capillary circulation, and anti arterio-sclerosis.[7]May inhibit stomach and asophagus cancer. [4] jiu cai extract inhibited cancer cell growth and induced apoptosis in vitro. Oral administration of jiu cai extract significantly reduced lung metastases [5]韭菜中的硫化物能幫助人體吸收維 生素B1及維生素A有抗胃癌，食道癌之作用。[4] 韭菜提取物抑制腫瘤細胞的生長和誘導的凋亡。中國韭菜提取物口服顯著降低肺癌的轉移[5]。
Actions & Indications - \u4e3b\u6cbb: Jiu cai is used as stimulating tonic. It possesses the effects of improving digestion, enhancing mental alertness, warming. Roots and leaves and be juiced and can be used for anti inflammation, arresting bleeding and pain. It is suitable for gan shen yin xu (liver-kidney yin deficient) with sweating during sleep, bed wetting, frequent urination, impotence, priapism, spermatorrhea, esophagus cancer, nausea, dysentery, abdomen pain, menses sickness, pain during menses, bleeding not during menses, vagina discharge, injuries from impact, vomiting blood, nose bleeding. Being use inyinxu (yin deficient), immature ejaculation and spermtorrhea.為振奮性強壯藥，有健胃，提神，溫暖作用。根，葉搗汁有消炎止血，止痛之功。適用於肝腎陰虚盜汗，遺尿，尿頻，陽痿，陽強不倒，遺精，夢遺，噎隔 (食管癌)，反胃，下痢，腹痛，婦女月經病，痛經，經漏，帶 下以及跌打損傷，吐血，鼻衄等症，用於補陰 虛，精關不固等。
Chemical Ingredients - \u5316\u5b78\u621: Four new steroidal saponins have been isolated from the seeds of Allium tuberosum: 26-O-β-d-glucopyranosyl-(25S,20R)-20-O-methyl-5α-furost-22(23)-en-2α,3β,20,26-tetraol 3-O-α-l-rhamnopyranosyl-(1→2)-[α-l-rhamnopyranosyl-(1→4)]-β-d-glucopyranoside (1); 26-O-β-d-glucopyranosyl-(25S,20R)-5α-furost-22(23)-en-2α,3β,20,26-tetraol 3-O-α-l-rhamnopyranosyl-(1→2)-[α-l- rhamnopyranosyl-(1→4)]-β-d-glucopyranoside (2); 26-O-β-d-glucopyranosyl-(25S,20S)-5α-furost-22(23)-en-2α,3β,20,26-tetraol 3-O-α-l-rhamnopyranosyl-(1→2)-[α-l- rhamnopyranosyl-(1→4)]-β-d-glucopyranoside (3); and 26-O-β-d-glucopyranosyl-(25S,20S)-5α-furost-22(23)-en-3β,20,26-triol 3-O-α-l-rhamnopyranosyl-(1→2)-[α-l-rhamnopyranosyl-(1→4)]-β-d-glucopyranoside (4).【1】The plant contains: vitamin C, B1, B2, niacin, carotene, carbohydrates, and mineral. It also contain high level of fiber.韭菜籽：四種新的甾體皂甙曾於韭菜籽分離出來。請看以上英文部分。韭菜含 ：維生素C，維生素B1，維生素B2，尼克酸，胡蘿卜素，碳水化合物及礦物質。韭菜還含有豐富的纖維素。
Daily Dosage - \u6bcf\u65e5\u7528\u91cf: 100 g to 200 g per meal.Seed used in decoction: 6~12 g; or make into powder or pills.每餐100克至200克。韭子用量：6～12克，煎湯；或入丸散。
Samples of Formulae - \u8655\u65b9\u8209: jiu zi wan 韭子丸《聖濟總錄》
Modern Application - \u73fe\u4ee3\u61c9\: Study on Cell Agglutination and Sugar-inhibiting Action of the Lectin from jiu cai
Contraindications / Toxicity - \u6bd2\u7: It is not suitable for those who are yinxu (yin deficient). Because of its abundance of coarse fiber, it is not easy to be digested. Easting too much can irritate the the wall of the intestines and cause diarrhea.According to Ben Cao Gang Mu eating too much jiu cai can lead to blurry eyesight and confusion or even coma 【2】. It should be avoided especially after drinking alcohol.陰虛及 熱性病症的人不宜食用。韭菜的粗纖維多，不易消化吸收，，否則大量粗纖維可刺激腸壁而引起腹瀉。《本 草綱目》 ：韭菜多食則神昏【3】目暗，酒後尤 忌。

Name: yi zhi huang hua 一枝黃花
Latin Name - \u62c9\u4e01\u540d: Solidago decurrens Lour.
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: produced in eastern, middle eastern and south western part of China.華東，中南，西南。
Properties / Characteristics - \u6027\u5: acrid, bitter, neutral, slightly toxic.辛，苦，平，有小毒。
Medical Function - \u85e5\u7406: Antibacterial effect using decoction (species not identified) of yi zhi huang hua in vitro against Staphylococcus aureus, Streptococcus pneumoniae, Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Shu's, Shigella sonnei bacilli showed varying degrees of inhibition. Decoction taken orally: Rabbits tracheitis (inhalation of ammonia vapor formation) role, showed a therapeutic effect, wheezing status lifted, wheezing disappeared relieve dry rales. Containing saponins, yet some expectorant effect. Diuretic effect extracts of mice were injected subcutaneously with a diuretic effect, but the dose is too large anti enables decreased urine output. Oral equally effective. People also. Prolonged storage of the herb can render it ineffective. Other role hemostatic effect of acute (hemorrhagic) nephritis may be related to the flavonoids, chlorogenic acid, or caffeic acid contained in the herb.The topical application can help treatment of trauma. It can be related to volatile oil or the tannins of the herb.1.抗菌作用 煎劑（品種未鑒定）在試管內對金黃色葡萄球菌、肺炎球菌、綠膿杆菌及舒氏、宋內氏痢疾杆菌有不同程度的抑菌作用。 2.對家兔實驗性氣管炎（吸入氨水蒸氣形成）的作用 煎劑內服，有治療作用，喘息狀態解除，哮鳴音消失，干性羅音減輕。因含皂甙，尚有些祛痰作用。 3. 利尿作用 提取物對小鼠皮下注射有利尿作用，但劑量太大反可使尿量減少。口服同樣有效。對人亦有此作用。久貯失效。 4.其他作用 對急性（出血性）腎炎有止血作用，可能與其所含之黃酮類或綠原酸、咖啡酸有關。外用可治創傷，可能與其含揮發油或鞣質有關。

Name: fucoidan 岩藻聚糖硫酸酯
Chemical Ingredients - \u5316\u5b78\u621: Sulfated fucan岩藻多糖硫酸酯
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: Sulfatedfucan is extracted from a sea weed, Laminaria japonica.The main production areas are China and Japan.岩藻聚糖硫酸酯 提取于海帶科植物海帶（Laminaria japonica ）
Properties / Characteristics - \u6027\u5: light yellow powder; can be dissolved in water.微黄色粉末，能溶于水
Medical Function - \u85e5\u7406: Medical Functions:anti-tumor: fucoidans inhibit the heparinase of cancer cells and inhibits secretion of growth factors of cancer cells. These growth factors are attached to the sulfated heparin. Fucoidans also have strong attraction to some of those growth factors and prevent them to return to the combining to the cancer cells. The cancer cells that have combined with fucoidans become mal-nourished and the reproduction function of the cancer cells will become weakened and exhausted.anti-virus.antibioticanti platelet coagulation: anti blood clotlower blood lipidssuppresses overly active auto immune system [1]藥理﹕抗凝作用，促進腎臟損傷的修復作用，抗氧化、抗血脂、抗凝血、岩藻聚糖硫酸酯 的抗癌作用： 抑制癌细胞所分泌的肝素酶，使得附着硫酸類肝素的癌细胞增殖因子难以游离出来；另外，岩藻聚糖硫酸酯 對一部分的增殖因子有很强的吸附作用，所以可將從硫酸類肝素上游離出 來的增殖因子吸附，避免其回復結合到癌细胞。和岩藻聚糖硫酸酯 結合後的癌细胞由於無法獲取增殖因子，漸漸發生 營養不足、增殖能力减弱、逐漸趋向衰竭，其結果使得癌细胞向周围組織的浸潤受到抑制而 抗 腫瘤、抑制免疫作用
Actions & Indications - \u4e3b\u6cbb: Supplement to cancer therapy
Contraindications / Toxicity - \u6bd2\u7: It should not contain excessive amount of arsenic, cadmium and mercury.

Samples of Formulae - \u8655\u65b9\u8209: Acute conjunctivitis: cao jue ming, ju hua, huang qi. Add water and make into decoction and use as tea.Hypertension: cao jue ming, ju hua, xia ku cao. Add water and make into decoction and use as tea.急性結膜炎: 草决明，菊 花，黃 芩。水煎服 。高血壓：草决明，菊 花，夏枯 草。水煎服。

Name: hai feng teng 海風藤
Latin Name - \u62c9\u4e01\u540d: Piper kadsura (Choisy) Ohwi
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: It is distributed in Zhejiang, Fujian, Guangdong, Taiwan. Mainly produced in Fujian, Zhejiang, and Taiwan.分佈於浙江、福建、廣東、台灣等地。主產福建、浙江及台灣等地。
Properties / Characteristics - \u6027\u5: acrid, bitter, slightly warm.辛，苦，微溫。
Medical Function - \u85e5\u7406: Effect on coronary heart disease and cerebral thrombosis:Hai feng teng can increase myocardial nutritional blood flow of mice, and reduce myocardial ischemia collateral vascular resistance of dogs, and has a good effect on coronary heart disease and cerebral thrombosis.[1][2]Anti-inflammation effect:[2][3] Hai feng teng extract can antagonize the rat intravenous endotoxin-induced decline in arterial blood pressure, and reduce endotoxemia pulmonary edema caused by increased pulmonary vascular wall permeability. Such effects of hai feng teng may be related to its antagonistic effect on PAF (platelet activating factor) by its chemical ingredient of futoenone The traditional Chinese medicine, hai feng teng, is a worthy for trying to treat endotoxin shock. [1]. Denudatin-B showed potent PAF antagonistic activity in 3H-PAF receptor binding assay[3] 海風藤能增加小鼠心肌營養血流量，降低狗心肌缺血區側枝血管阻力，對冠心病和腦血栓有較好的療效。海風藤提取物可以拮抗大鼠靜脈注射內毒素引起的動脈血壓下降，並能減輕內毒素血症對肺血管壁通透性增高引起的肺水腫。海風藤的這種效應可能與其中風藤烯酮與PAF的拮抗作用有關。PAF（血小板激活因子）提示海風藤是一種值得嘗試的治療內毒素休克的中藥。【1】化驗結果玉蘭脂B表現出強有力的拮抗3H-PAF之受體而降低PAF（血小板激活因子）之 活性。[3]
Actions & Indications - \u4e3b\u6cbb: for getting rid of rheumatism, clearing meridians, correcting qi flow (li qi), arresting pain. Mainly used in wind cold type of arthritis, pain in joints, spastic muscles, cold and pain in abdomen, edema.祛風濕；通經絡；理氣；止痛。主風寒濕痺；肢節疼痛；筋脈拘攣；脘腹冷痛；水腫

Chemical Ingredients - \u5316\u5b78\u621.Futoamide: 細葉青蔞藤酷胺(風藤酰胺)
Chemical Ingredients - \u5316\u5b78\u621.Modern Application - \u73fe\u4ee3\u61c9\: 近年又分得4個大葉素型雙環[3,2,1]辛烷類新木脂素。

Samples of Formulae - \u8655\u65b9\u8209: For postpartum arthritis [2]Name of Formula: Qing Re Chu Bi Tang (Rid of heat and arthritis decoction)Application: Pain in the body, red, hot and swelling in jointsComposition: ren dong teng 30 g, wei ling xian 9 g, qing feng teng 15 g, hai feng teng 15 g, luo shi teng 15 g, fang ji 9 g, sang zhi 30 g, zhui di feng 9 g.Boil with water and use as tea. 方名: 清熱除痺湯 （劉奉伍婦科經驗）功效: 清熱散濕，疏風活血。 主治: 產後身疼，關節紅腫灼痛。組成: 忍冬藤1兩，威靈仙 3錢，青風藤 5錢，海風藤 5錢，絡石藤 5 錢，防己 3 錢，桑枝1兩，追地風 3 錢。 支氣管炎：海風藤、追地風各二兩。用白酒一斤，浸泡一周。日服二次，每次10毫升，早晚空腹服。服時不可加溫，否則失效。心臟病人及孕婦忌服，感冒及月經期暫停服。(《全展選編·內科》)
Contraindications / Toxicity - \u6bd2\u7: Those with condition of yinxu with fire should use with care.陰虚火旺慎服。

Daily Dosage - \u6bcf\u65e5\u7528\u91cf: 10～20g。Concentrated extract: 0.5 ~2 g10～20公克。濃縮中藥：0.5～2 公克。

Name: ji xue teng 雞血藤
Modern Application - \u73fe\u4ee3\u61c9\: Spatholobus suberectus 密花豆See medical function on other items .其餘請看藥理條。
Latin Name - \u62c9\u4e01\u540d: Millettia Dielsiana Harms (香花岩豆藤 (山雞血藤).)Millettia reticulata Benth , (昆明雞血藤)Spatholobus suberectus Dunn (密花豆屬密花豆)Kadsura interior A.c.Smith (内南五味子)Kadsura heteroclita (Roxb.) Craib．(異形南五味子)
Other Name - \u5225\u540d: feng xue teng 風血藤, ma lu teng 馬鹿藤, zi geng teng 紫梗藤.
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: Guangdong, Guangxi, Yunnan provinces of China.分 佈 於 廣 東 ﹐ 廣 西﹐ 雲南 。
Properties / Characteristics - \u6027\u5: bitter, slightly sweet, warm and nontoxic.味苦﹐微甘，性溫﹐無毒。
Medical Function - \u85e5\u7406: Medical functions:Decoction of Millettia Dielsiana Harms (山雞血藤) or Spatholobus suberectus Dunn (密花豆), showed that it could improve the anemia condition (created in laboratory) of rabbits and possessed anti-inflammatory effect.Small amount can enhance the rhythmic contraction of the uteri of rabbits, and in larger amount the effect is even stronger. Conceived uteri are sensitive.Decoction of Millettia Dielsiana (山雞血藤) can inhibit Staphylococcus aureusDecoction of Millettia Dielsiana (山雞血藤) enhance the function of macrophages and improve immune system.Inhibits platelet coagulation caused by adenosine diphosphate (in vitro), thus lower the vaso-resistance and improved the circulation of the coronary arteries and the circulation in the thigh.improved the low white cell count of lab mice caused by cyclophosphamide (環磷醯胺).lowered total cholesterol and increased the low density cholesterol of quails藥理﹕密花豆及山雞血藤煎劑對實驗性貧血的家兔均有補血作用，有抗炎作用。小劑量能增強子宮節律性收縮，較大劑量收縮更顯著，已孕子宮較未孕子宮敏感。山雞血藤煎劑體外試驗對金黃葡萄球菌有抑制作用。增強巨噬細胞功能。增強免功能。對環磷醯胺所致的小白鼠白血球細胞下降有顯著的治療作用。在體外能抑制二磷腺甘或膠原誘導的血小板聚集。降低血管阻力，如能增加離體免心冠脈血流量﹐股動脈的血流量等。降低鹌鹑的總胆固醇，提高高密度胆固醇：抑制心脏與降低血压作用
Actions & Indications - \u4e3b\u6cbb: Actions & Indications: irregular menses, flow of menses not smooth, menostasis due to blood deficient , suitable for diseases due to blood deficient or blood stasis . low platelet count rheumatoid arthritis, especially with blood deficient and blood stasis. seguelae of strokes; combine other herbs with blood and qi tonic properties. blood deficient; combine other herbs with qi and blood tonic properties. 用於月經不調﹐經行不暢﹐血虛經閉等症。 治白血球細胞減少症。 雞血藤既能活血，又能補血，對 血瘀﹐血虛 之症均適用。 風濕性關節炎，尤其是慢性患者有血虛血瘀的更為適宜。用於風濕痺痛及手足麻木﹐肢體癱瘓﹐血虛萎黃等，配祛風濕藥同用。 治中風後肢體癱瘓，配益氣養血活血通絡藥同用。 用於血虛萎黃，則配補益氣血藥同用
Daily Dosage - \u6bcf\u65e5\u7528\u91cf: 10 to 20 g. Concentrate extract 0.5 ~ 2 g.10～20克；濃縮中藥：0.5～2 克。
Samples of Formulae - \u8655\u65b9\u8209: For blood stasis: ji xue teng, hong hua, chuan xiong , xiang fuFor blood deficient: ji xue teng, shu di huang, dang gui.瘀滯者，配 紅花﹐川 芎﹐香附子﹐等以活血化瘀調經。血虛者，配 熟地黃﹐當 歸, 等以養血調經。
Contraindications / Toxicity - \u6bd2\u7: Use with care for those with yinxu with fire syndrome. 陰虚火旺者慎用。

Name: li lu 藜蘆
Latin Name - \u62c9\u4e01\u540d: Veratrum schindleri Loesi. f.﹐ (天目藜蘆)Veratrum grandiflorum Loes. f.﹐(毛葉藜蘆)Veratrum dahuricum (Turcz.) Loes. f. (興安藜蘆)Veratrum mauckii Regel. (毛穗藜蘆 )Veratrum patulum L. (光脈藜蘆)Hemerocallis thunbergii Baker [麝暑萱 (華東地區也曾用)]Hemerocallis citrina Baroni[金針菜 (華東地區也曾用)]
Other Name - \u5225\u540d: cong ran 蔥苒﹐cong kui 蔥葵﹐shan cong 山蔥﹐wei lu 韋蘆﹐hui kui 蕙葵﹐gong ran 公苒﹐cong dan 蔥菼﹐li lu 梨盧﹐cong bai li lu 蔥白藜蘆﹐lu cong 鹿蔥﹐gan cong 憨蔥﹐cong lu蔥蘆﹐cong guan li lu 蔥管藜蘆﹐han cong 旱蔥﹐ren tou 人頭﹐du yao cao 毒藥草﹐qi li dan 七厘丹。
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: mainly produced in Shanxi, Hebei, Henan, Shandong, Liaoning provinces of China.主產於山西﹐河北﹐河南﹐山東﹐遼寧等省。
Medical Function - \u85e5\u7406: lowers blood pressure, lowers heart rate, lowers respiration rate.有降低血壓，減慢心率，減慢呼吸的作用。
Actions & Indications - \u4e3b\u6cbb: Kills parasites and itching use externally: make into fine powder andadd vegetable oil and make into paste for scabies, ringworm and lice.Internal usage: for promoting vomiting.外用治疥癬﹐頭蝨﹐牛皮癬。 用藜蘆研為細末，加生油調成軟 膏，外塗。内服催吐。注意：一般用量為 0.3 至0.9克。

Chemical Ingredients - \u5316\u5b78\u621.23-O-\u03b2-Dglucopyranosyl-20- isoverat: 23-O-β-D-吡喃葡萄糖基-20-異藜蘆甾二烯胺(22S，23R，25S)

Daily Dosage - \u6bcf\u65e5\u7528\u91cf: In pill or powder form: 0.3 g to 0.9 g.External application: use appropriate amount. 0.3 克至0.9 克，宜作散劑。外 用適量。
Samples of Formulae - \u8655\u65b9\u8209: To promote vomiting: Use fang feng, gua di, li lu. Grind into finepowder.Take a small amount. Take with warm drinking water topromote vomiting.Note: li lu is very poisonous. The dosage is 0.3 to 0.9 gram.Vomit caused by taking this herb can be stopped by drinkingthe decoction of white portion of green onion.作催吐用。如欲湧吐痰涎，作為急救，可用防風，瓜蒂，藜蘆三味，研細末，取少量，溫水送服以催吐。本品有劇毒，用時宜慎。 用量為﹕0.3 克至0.9 克服本品後吐者服蔥湯即止。
Contraindications / Toxicity - \u6bd2\u7: Toxic reactions include: the sensation of poking by needle in the throatand tongue, burning sensation in the upper abdomen and breast bone,drooping of saliva, nausea, vomiting, pain in abdomen, diarrhea, bloodin stool, numbness around the mouth area, blurry vision, hazy mind,arrhythmia. In serious cases the blood pressure drops, vertigo, headache,difficulty in breathing, whole body spasm and eventually function of theheart and breathing stop.一般中毒舌及咽喉有針刺樣感覺，上腹部及胸骨後有燒灼感，還有流涎﹐惡心﹐嘔吐﹐腹痛 腹瀉﹐血性大便﹐口周圍麻木﹐視覺模糊﹐神志不清﹐心律失常等。嚴重中毒可引起血壓下降﹐眩暈﹐頭痛﹐呼吸困難﹐全身痙攣，最後可至心跳或呼吸停 止。
Antidote - \u6025\u6551: Lavage with potassium permanganate solution or with 1% tannin acid. If diarrhea is not serious, magnesium sulfate can be used to induce diarrhea.高錳酸鉀液或 1% 鞣酸洗胃。腹瀉不嚴重時，可給硫酸鎂導瀉。

Boil with water. One package a day.治甲狀腺腺瘤，用昆布10克，海藻10克，土貝母10克，天葵子10克，全當歸 6克，川芎 6克 ，烏藥 6克，八月扎 9克，玄參12克，海浮石12克，用水煎服，每日一劑。

Medical Function - \u85e5\u7406: Medical Functions:Anti-oxidant effect: it can protect the liver from damages caused by a lipid type of peroxide.anti aging [18]Lower blood sugar effect: it inhibits the increase of glycogen caused by glucose and epinephrine.Improves memory that has been damaged by drug or alcohol.Adjusts the blood flow of the CNS.Increases the flow volume of oxygen-carrying blood to the heart muscle; thus protects the muscle from damage caused by lack of oxygen.Anti-hypoxia: It may prevent hypoxia-induced biological changes by either increasing intracellular oxygen diffusion and efficiency of oxygen utilization or reducing hypoxia-induced oxidative damage with its anti-oxidative ability; thus prevents high altitude sickness.1Helps prevent strokes caused by hypertension.Improves exercise endurance3 It has been used to improve or maintain endurance performance of athletes during training or competition by increasing biological factors associated with oxygen uptake. In-vivo experiments have shown that oral treatment with R. rosea extracts in rats can significantly prolong the duration of long-distance swimming and activate the synthesis or re-synthesis of ATP in mitochondria, which acts as the main energy source for most cellular functions and is essential for locomotion and respiration.2Supplementation can reduce serum BUN, ALT and AST levels.[12]Anti-inflammatoryAnti-stress [6]Anti-depression [7]. Rhodiola rosea L. roots have potent anti-depressant activity by inhibiting MAO A and may also find application in the control of senile dementia by their inhibition of MAO B.[13]Alleviates anxiety [8]Catechol-O-methyl-transferase (COMT) inhibiting effect, potentially enhancing the activity of presynaptic released dopamine.[5]Prevents damaging effect of microwave radiation.Hepatoprotective effect [9]Decreased lipid peroxidation. Gui zhi and hong jing tian extracts may be effective for correcting hyperglycemia and preventing diabetic complications.[11]Suppresses the biological enzymes of HCV NS3, thereby preventing the replication of hepatitis C virus.Promotes the release of norepinephrine from rat penile corpus cavernosum smooth muscle cell and artery endothelium cell, which was correlated with its effect of resisting senility.[14]The adaptogenic, cardiopulmonary protective, and central nervous system activities of Rhodiola rosea have been attributed primarily to its ability to influence levels and activity of monoamines and opioid peptides such as beta-endorphins. [15]Prolongs the life span of fruit flies by about 24% - 25% that were fed with the extract of the herb.[17],[18], [19]beneficial anti-inflammation effects, lower COPD assessment test score and decreased high-sensitivity C-reactive protein, on COPD8.patients [20]effective in preventing the initiation of tumors and slowing down the tumor growth in mice bearing tumor grafts, thereby further demonstrating its possible potential for treatment of breast cancer progression and metastasis [21](See also a report that refutes this.)Cardiac stimulating effect. Name: bie jia 鱉 甲
Latin Name - \u62c9\u4e01\u540d: Trionyx sinensis Wiegmann
Other Name - \u5225\u540d: tuan yu jia 團魚甲，shui yu jia 水魚甲，
Common Name - \u82f1\u6587\u540d: hard shell of soft shell turtle
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: Mainly produced in Hubei, Anhui, Jiangsu, Henan, Hubei, Zhejiang, Jiangxi provinces of China.主 產 於 湖 北 ﹐ 安 徽 ﹐ 江 蘇 ﹐ 河 南 ﹐ 湖 北 ﹐ 浙 江 ﹐ 江 西 等 省 。
Meridians Entered - \u6b78\u7d93: liver, spleen, kidney.入 肝 , 脾 , 腎 經 。
Medical Function - \u85e5\u7406: Prevent cirrhosis of liver and spleenImproves immune system. Anti-tumor effect. Soft shell turtle shell powder, for oral of 280 mg / kg in mice with transplanted cancer MH134, inhibited tumors with reduced diameter, and significantly reduced tumor weight; but for ascites carcinoma there was no significant effect. On the nude mice with transplanted human colon cancer cells, given the daily dose of 800mg / kg of soft shell turtle shell powder, the result was that: treatment and control group, the inhibitory rate was 92.15%, and tumor necrosis area was 67%. Compare to using the drug 5-fluorouracil (5- Fu) group, the advantage was that it did not cause white blood cell count to decrease. This indicate that the turtle shell powder can inhibit colorectal cancer in human, and with only small side effect, bone marrow suppression effect is much less than that of 5-Fu. 《source: Zhong Hua Ben Cao 》藥理﹕防 止肝, 脾硬化 (組織壞死 )有 增強身體免疫機能作用 。抗腫瘤作用。鱉甲粉末口服280mg/kg對小鼠移植實質性癌MH134具有抑制作用，使腫瘤直徑減小，腫瘤重量顯著減輕。對腹水癌則沒有顯著作用。對接種人腸癌細胞的裸鼠每日按800mg/kg劑量口服鱉甲粉，治療35 天後與對照組比較，抑瘤率為92.15%，腫瘤壞死面積達67%，與5-氟尿嘧啶(5-Fu)組比較,其優點是不引起宿主白細胞數下降，表明鱉甲粉不僅對人腸癌有抑制作用，且副反應小，對骨髓的抑制遠比5-Fu輕。(資料來源: 《 中華本草 》
Actions & Indications - \u4e3b\u6cbb: For yinxu (yin deficient) with flashes: usually combine with qing hao, di gu pi For yinxu with heat and pain: usually combine with gui ban, mu li, bai shao, e jiao .For chronic malaria, pain in rib and chest, amenorrhea, cirrhosis hardening and swelling of liver and spleen: usually combine with san leng , e zhu, qing pi , xiang fu zi, hong hua ,tao ren.For enlargement of liver and spleen.For enlargement of thyroid glandsFor enlargement of lymphatic glandsBie jia should be cooked first (cook longer than other herbs) or roasted in sand.In promoting yin and and suppressing yang, bie jia should be use untreated. For treating breast tumors, it should be roasted in sand first.治陰 虛潮熱 ﹕ 常配青 蒿 , 地骨皮等同用 ；治陰虛陽亢動風 ﹕ 常與龜 板 , 牡蠣 , 白 芍 , 阿膠等同用 。治久瘧 , 瘧母 , 胸脅作痛及月經不通 ，癥瘕 積聚等症 ﹕ 可 與 三 棱 , 莪朮 , 青皮 , 香附子 , 紅花 , 桃仁等 配 伍應用 。 治肝脾腫大、甲狀線及淋巴 腺腫大。 治再 生障礙性貧血（即骨髓不造血）。 生 品先煎或砂炙。滋陰潛陽宜生用，軟堅散結宜砂炙用。
Chemical Ingredients - \u5316\u5b78\u621: animal colloid, among them collagen is the main constituent, keratin, iodine, vitamin D, calcium phosphate, calcium carbonate.動物膠，其中骨膠原為主要成份，角蛋白，碘質，維生素D，磷酸鈣，碳酸鈣等。
Daily Dosage - \u6bcf\u65e5\u7528\u91cf: For internal use: 10 to 24 g in decoctionFor external use: make into powder. Use appropriate amount and apply to affected area.內服 入煎劑 ，常用具10～24克。 外用：研末撒或調敷。

qualify of herb:\u98f2\u7247\u7684\u8cea: Those bie jia (soft turtle shells) sold, if they are clean and white in color, most of them have been extracted for bie jia jiao (gelatin). They are waste product and do have have medicinal value.市上賣的潔白， 看來很乾淨的鱉甲大多數經過熬煉鱉甲膠的廢物, 沒有藥用價值。沒經過熬煉的鱉甲應該還帶有一些皮肉的。

Name: ba jiao hui xiang 八角茴香
Latin Name - \u62c9\u4e01\u540d: Illicium verum Hook. f.
Cantonese - \u7cb5\u8a9e\u767c\u97f3: baat3 gok3 wui4 hoeng1 (八角茴香); baat3 gok3 (八角)
Other Name - \u5225\u540d: da hui xiang 大茴香，da liao 大料，wu xiang ba jiao 五香八角，po shang hui xiang 舶上茴香、po hui xiang 舶茴香、hui xiang ba jiao zhu 茴香八角珠、ba jiao xiang 八角香、ba jiao da hui 八角大茴、ba jiao 八角、yuan you hui 原油茴。
Common Name - \u82f1\u6587\u540d: Fructus Anisi stellati, star anise, star aniseed, Chinese star anise.
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: in Guangdong, Yunnan, Guizhou, Hunan, Taiwan provinces of China, also in southeast Asia and India etc.廣西、雲南、貴州 、廣東，湖南，台灣與東南亞，印度等地。
Meridians Entered - \u6b78\u7d93: liver, kidney, spleen, stomach.肝，腎，脾，胃。
Actions & Indications - \u4e3b\u6cbb: being used in cold type of hernia, chronic lower back pain with shenxu (kidney deficient), vomiting due to coldness in stomach, pain and coldness in stomach.溫陽散寒，理氣止痛。用於寒疝腹痛， 腎虛腰痛，胃寒嘔吐，脘腹冷痛。
Chemical Ingredients - \u5316\u5b78\u621: The seed containsevaporating oil about 4 to 9%. In general it contains about 5% and more of it in the skin of the seeds. The main evaporating oil is anethole (about 80 to 90%). Usually it separates itself when it is cold. The remainder are d-pinene, I--phellandrene, α-terpineol and small amount of safrole*, methyl chavicol.fat about 22% (mainly in seed)protein, resin, rubber etc.leaves contain: evaporating oil which consists of anethole, anisaldehyde etc.*In one study, it mentioned the safrole was not found in Illicium verum but found in all toxic Illicium species, but not in Illicium verum.[2]果實含揮發油4～9％，一般約為5％(果皮中較多)，脂肪油約22％(主存於種子中)及蛋白質，樹膠，樹脂等。揮發油中主要成份為茴香醚(anethole) 約80～90％，冷時常自油中析出，其餘為d-蒎烯 (d-pinene)，l- 水芹烯 (I--phellandrene) ，α-萜品醇 (α-terpineol)及 少量黃樟醚 (safrole)** ，甲基胡椒酚(methyl chavicol)。葉含揮發油，油中含茴香醚 (anethole)，茴香醛 (anisaldehyde)等**有研究报告說本品(Illicium verum)不含黃樟醚 (safrole)，但其他有毒的品種則含黃樟醚 [2]。
Samples of Formulae - \u8655\u65b9\u8209: 1. Hernia: ba jiao hui xiang, xiao hui xiang 9 g each, ru xiang small amount. Boil with water. Use as tea. Cover the body to induce sweating. 2. li zhi san (source: Zheng Zhi Zhun Sheng):Application: For hernia, swelling of testes, pain cannot be tolerated.Composition: li zhi he (fresh, bake till dark) 14 pieces, star anise (stir fry), chen xiang. mu xiang, qing yan (coarse lake salt), table salt 3 g each, chuan lian zi fruit, xiao hui xiang 6 each.Take 9 g each time. Mix with warm rice wine and take with empty stomach 1. 疝氣：八角茴香，小 茴香， 各9克，, 乳香 些少。水煎服。蓋被取汗。 2, 荔枝散 (證治准繩)： 主治: 疝氣﹐睾 丸腫 大，痛不可忍組成：荔 枝核（用新鮮者，燒炭存性）14 枚，八 角茴香（炒）、沉 香、木 香 、青鹽、食 鹽 各3g，川 楝子肉、小茴香各6g。上為細末。 用法：每服9g，空腹時熱酒調下。
Contraindications / Toxicity - \u6bd2\u7: Use with care in cases of yinxu (yin deficient) with heat. Sometimes the Chinese star anise (Illicium verum) is adulterated with Japanese star anise (Illicium anisatum L) which can be toxic and may have side effects for infants. The side effects can include: signs of acute-onset irritability, jitteriness, clonus or myoclonus, increased deep tendon reflexes, nystagmus, vomiting, and seizures.[2] It is not advisable to use star anise on infants.陰虛火 旺者慎服。有時八角茴香 (Illicium verum)之商品可能混有日本産的八角茴香而對婴兒可能産生急 性發作之煩躁不安，顫抖，抽筋或肌陣攣，增加深部肌腱反射，眼 球震顫，嘔吐和癲癇。不應用之於婴兒。

Name: hai ma
Latin Name - \u62c9\u4e01\u540d: Hippocampus kelloggi Jordanet Snvder (克氏海馬}Hippocampus histrix Kaup (刺海馬}Hippocampus kuda Bleeker (大海馬}Hippocampus trimaculatus Leach (三班海馬}Hippocampus japonicus Kaup (日本海馬}
Other Name - \u5225\u540d: shui ma 水馬《抱补子》﹐xia gu 蝦姑《海南介語》﹐long luo zi 龍落子﹐ma tou yu 馬頭魚《動物學大辭典》
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: Produced in southern part of China, Thailand,産於中國南部，泰國等。
Actions & Indications - \u4e3b\u6cbb: asthma, impotence, unable to conceive, sleepiness and lack of strength, infection of throat, skin diseases, difficulty in delivery babies, insomnia due to deficiency, sciatica, injuries, abdomen pain, and breast cancer.哮喘﹐陽痿及不孕﹐嗜 眠症和體力衰竭﹐喉嚨感染﹐皮膚病﹐難產﹐ 虛煩不眠﹐腰腿痛﹐跌打損傷, 腹痛﹐乳腺癌。
Medical Function - \u85e5\u7406: sex hormone effect: the alcohol extract of hai ma can prolong the heat period of female rats, increases the weight of the ovaries and possesses the effect of female hormone. It also can increase the weight of the prostate gland, spermatophore, and levator ani muscles. Its effect is stronger than she chuang zi, yin yang huo, ge jie.anti aging effect: hai ma can increase the threshold of mice in lack of oxygen, lower monoamine oxidase, and lower lipid peroxide inside the body.anti cancer effect: water decoction of hai long can promote normal people peripheral lymphocyte transformation, can inhibit human cancer cells. It is possible to observe the dissolving of the cancer cells after contacting the extract of hai long. The larger the dosage the larger was the rate of dissolving of the cells and the more obvious was the leaching out of the content of the cancer cells. 性激素作用：海馬乙醇提取物能引起與延長雌鼠動情期，增加其卵巢與子宮重量而有雌性激素作用。也能增加雄鼠的前列腺，精囊，提肛肌的重量，亦有雄激素樣作用。其效力較蛇床子，淫羊藿，蛤 蚧強。 抗衰老作用：大海馬能增加小鼠耐缺氧性，降低單胺氧化酶，降低過氧化脂質體內水平。顯明有抗衰老作用。
Samples of Formulae - \u8655\u65b9\u8209: For impotence or unable to conceive: hai ma, bake dry and make into powder. Take 3 g each time, 3 times a day with some yellow rice wine.陽萎 ﹐ 不孕﹕ 海馬焙乾研為細末 ﹐每服３克 ﹐ 每日３次 ﹐ 黃 酒 沖 服 。
Chemical Ingredients - \u5316\u5b78\u621: Contains protease, fat, various amino acid and salt。The yellow color of the skin of Hippocampus histrix Kaup (刺海馬) is γ-carotene, and the red color is astaxanthin, astacene, and the black color is melanin. It also contain acetylcholinesterase, cholinesterase.The Hippocampus trimaculatus Leach (三班海馬) contains stearic acid, and cholesterol .含蛋白酶 (protease), 脂肪﹐ 多種氨基酸及無機鹽。（1）刺海馬皮肤黄色素為 γ－胡萝卜素（γ-carotene）, 红色素為虾毒素（astaxanthin） 喇蛄素（astacene）,黑色素為黑素（melanin）。并含乙酰胆碱酯酶（acetylcholinesterase）﹐ 胆碱酯酶 (cholinesterase)。（2）三斑海馬 含硬脂酸 （Stearic Acid）﹐膽 固醇 (cholesterol) ﹐胆甾二醇。
Daily Dosage - \u6bcf\u65e5\u7528\u91cf: For decoction: 3 to 9 g. Taken in powder form: 1 to 3 g. External use: grind into fine powder．煎湯内服：3 ~ 9 克；或入散劑﹕1 ~ 3 克。外用：研末撒。
Contraindications / Toxicity - \u6bd2\u7: Not to use during pregnancy or in cases of yinxu (yin deficient) with high heat.Large dosage and long term usage can be toxic to kidneys孕婦及陰 虛火 旺者忌服。大劑量與長期服用 ﹐可能對腎臟有毒。

Name: lu gan shi 爐干石
Chemical Ingredients - \u5316\u5b78\u621: zinc carbonate, calcium oxide, magnesium oxide, manganese oxide, zinc oxide with a small amount of ferric oxide.主含碳酸锌, 氧化鈣﹐ 氧化鎂﹐ 氧化錳﹐ 氧化鋅﹐ 少量之氧化鐵。
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: Guangxi, Sichuan, Hunan廣西﹐ 四川﹐ 湖南。
Actions & Indications - \u4e3b\u6cbb: for swollen eyes, eyelid sores, ulcer not healing, pus oozing, eczema, itchy skin.目赤肿痛，眼缘赤烂，翳膜胬肉，溃疡不敛，脓水淋漓，湿疮，皮肤瘙痒。
Daily Dosage - \u6bcf\u65e5\u7528\u91cf: external use only外用。
Contraindications / Toxicity - \u6bd2\u7: do not take internally不可內服。

Name: Zingiber purpureum
Latin Name - \u62c9\u4e01\u540d: Zingiber purpureum RoscoeSynonim: Zingiber cassumunar Roxb.
Other Name - \u5225\u540d: ka sa meng na jiang 卡薩蒙納薑
Common Name - \u82f1\u6587\u540d: English: Cassumunar gingerThai: PlaiIndonesian: Panglai (Sunda), bengle (Jawa), pandhiyang (Madura).; mugle, bengle, bungle, baglai, baniai, banglai, bunglai,; bangle, kunit bolai, kunyit bolai (Sumatera), banggele (Bali),; bale, panini, manglai, manguiai, bangerei, wangelei, walegai,; kukuniran, kukundiren, unin makei, unin pakei, bangle, bongle
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: Tropical Asia: India, Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, Yunnan province of China etc.
Properties / Characteristics - \u6027\u5: fragrant, slightly spicy, slightly bitter.香，微辛，微苦。
Meridians Entered - \u6b78\u7d93: liver, spleen and lung.肝﹐脾﹐肺經。
Medical Function - \u85e5\u7406: anti-inflammatory effect抗炎
Actions & Indications - \u4e3b\u6cbb: For pain relief after surgery; muscle pain, painful menstruation, pain due to inflammation of the ears, throat, and nose, as antipyretics. Usage in Indonesian folk medicine: for treatment of fever, headache, cough, stomachache, common cold, constipation; jaundice, worm parasites, rheumatism, obesity; for shrinking abdomen after giving birth and as tonic. 抗風濕、抗發炎、鎮痛解熱。常用於手術後疼痛控制、消炎、肌肉疼痛，經痛，耳鼻喉發炎引起的疼痛。 印尼民間用於治療發熱，頭痛，咳嗽，胃痛，感冒，便秘，黃疸，寄生蟲，風濕，肥胖; 作生完孩子後之食補，產後收縮腹部。
Chemical Ingredients - \u5316\u5b78\u621: sabinene 27-34% G-terpinene 6-8% α-terpinene 4-5% terpinene-4-ol 30-35% E-1-(3,4-dimethoxyphenyl)butadiene as DMPBD 12-19%resin, starch, tannin. 檜27-34％ G-松油烯（g-不旋松油精) 6-8％ a-萜烯4-5％ 萜品烯-4 - 醇的30-35％的 E-1-（3,4 - 二甲氧基苯基）丁二烯，即 DMPBD12-19％樹脂，澱粉，單寧。
Daily Dosage - \u6bcf\u65e5\u7528\u91cf: 15 g (fresh root)
Samples of Formulae - \u8655\u65b9\u8209: For treatment of: Inflammation of the mucous membrane of the eye: zi jiang and jiang huang 15 g each and Cumin13 pieces of , washed and cut into pieces as needed. Boiled with 1 cup water and render till half a cup is left. After the decoction has cooling down, filter and take orally..眼睛的粘膜發炎症： 紫姜，姜黃各15克，孜然13枚。 洗淨，切成片。加水1杯煎成半杯。放涼，過濾後內服..
Modern Application - \u73fe\u4ee3\u61c9\: Anti-inflammatory effect of Zingiber cassumunar Roxb. and its active principles.Zingiber cassumunar rhizome showed more than 30% increase of CYP3A4 inhibition [1]Inhibits cyclooxygenase-2 (COX-2)http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1312247/table/TU1/
Contraindications / Toxicity - \u6bd2\u7: Avoid mixing this herb with warfarin, hypertension drugs or cholesterol drugs.[2]避免與抗凝血素香豆素或與治血壓高西藥，或降膽固醇西藥同用。

Name: luo shi teng 絡石藤
Latin Name - \u62c9\u4e01\u540d: Trachelospermum jasminoides (Lindl.) Lem.
Common Name - \u82f1\u6587\u540d: confederate jasmine stems, star jasmine stems, false jasmine stems
Distribution - \u5206\u4f48: mainly being produced in Jiangsu, Anhui, Hubei, Shandong, also in Guangdong, Guangxi, Sichuan, Zhejiang provinces.主產江蘇，安徽，湖北 ，山東。廣東，廣西，四川，浙江等地亦產。
Medical Function - \u85e5\u7406: This herb contains cardiac glycosides. It can enhance cardiac function and can promote blood circulation.anti-inflammatory [4], The decoction of the herb can relieve the histamine-induced contraction of tracheal muscles in guinea pig [2].analgesic,antipyretic,anti-oxidation,adjusting the immune system effect.antibiotic effect: inhibit Staphylococcus aureus, and Shigella. 絡石藤含強心甙。 有強心，促進血液循環作用，抗炎[4]。絡石 藤煎劑能改善因組胺引起豚鼠氣管收縮的症狀【2】。鎮痛解熱抗氧化調整免疫系統的作用。抗生：能抑制金黃色葡萄球菌，痢疾桿菌。
Actions & Indications - \u4e3b\u6cbb: Rheumatic fever, paralysis, waist and knee pain, throat inflammation, carbuncles.用於風濕熱痺、腰膝痠痛、喉痺、癰腫。

Chemical Ingredients - \u5316\u5b78\u621.apigenin 7-O-\u03b2-neospheroside: 芹菜素 7-O-β- 橙皮糖新苷
Chemical Ingredients - \u5316\u5b78\u621: 木犀草素luteolin
Chemical Ingredients - \u5316\u5b78\u621.lupeol unsaturated fatty acid ester: 羽扇豆醇不飽和脂肪酸酯

Daily Dosage - \u6bcf\u65e5\u7528\u91cf: In decoction: 5 to 15 g.煎剤：5～15 克。
Samples of Formulae - \u8655\u65b9\u8209: For postpartum arthritis [3]Name of Formula: Qing Re Chu Bi TangApplication: Pain in the body, red, hot and swelling in jointsComposition: ren dong teng 30 g, wei ling xian 9 g, qing feng teng 15 g, hai feng teng 15 g, luo shi teng 15 g, fang ji 9 g, sang zhi 30 g, zhui di feng 9 g.Boil with water and use as tea. For arthritis:Composition: luo shi teng 30 g, wu jia pi 30 g, niu xi 15 g.Simmer with water. Add some rice wine and use as tea.[5] 方名: 清熱除痺湯 （劉奉伍婦科經驗） 功效: 清熱散濕，疏風活血。 主治: 產後身疼，關節紅腫灼痛。組成: 忍冬藤1兩 ，威靈仙 3錢，青風藤 5錢，海風藤 5錢，絡石藤 5錢，防 己 3錢，桑 枝1兩，追 地風 3錢。 治關節炎：絡石藤、五加根皮各一兩，牛 膝根五錢。水煎服，白酒為引。
Contraindications / Toxicity - \u6bd2\u7: Not to use in cases of yang deficient with spleen deficient and with diarrhea.陽虛兼脾 虛易瀉泄者忌服。
